content: What 1980s TV show featured four older women living together in Miami and starred Bea Arthur, Betty White, Rue McClanahan, and Estelle Getty?

The 1980s TV show you're referring to is "The Golden Girls." It aired from 1985 to 1992 and was set in Miami, Florida. The show followed the lives of four older women living together: Sophie Albright (played by Beatrice Arthur), Blanche Devereaux (played by Rue McClanahan), Dorothy Zbornak (played by Betty White), and Rose Nylund (played by Estelle Getty). The series was known for its humor, wit, and addressing various social issues of the time.
